<traits>

<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 348 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=116), [Chamidu](/Deities.aspx?ID=188), [Chamidu](/Deities.aspx?ID=188), [Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=8), [Nalinivati](/Deities.aspx?ID=181)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 120-foot line

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

A bolt of lightning strikes outward from your hand, dealing 4d12 electricity damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d12.
